name: Fletch Quest (Doodleplexia)
description:
Welcome to this short comedy interactive fiction about Fletcher Yamamoto, of Blaseball fame, the people's favourite bird*!

A choose your own adventure game with two primary paths; eleven potential game overs; action; adventure; an over-use of adjectives; and more!

Age Rating: 12A - Contains swearing, references to alcohol, comedy violence, and moderate threat.

If you have any questions, criticism or feedback, please use the comments section below, or contact me directly at @BirbCarlin on twitter, and I'll try and get back to you as soon as I can.

*Accuracy of the definition 'favourite' may vary.
